trans-unit.source: Presents the packet information from a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Riporta le informazioni sui pacchetti restituite da una chiamata al metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni sull'origine del pacchetto ricevuto in seguito alla chiamata al metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o al metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that indicates the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> indicante le informazioni sull'origine del pacchetto ricevuto in seguito alla chiamata al metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o al metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: For packets that were sent from a unicast address, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the sender; for multicast or broadcast packets, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the multicast or broadcast <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso di pacchetti inviati da un indirizzo unicast, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> restituirà la classe <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> del mittente; per i pacchetti broadcast o multicast, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> restituirà la classe <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> multicast o broadcast.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare con questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se questa istanza è uguale a un oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="comparand" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> and equals the value of the instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="comparand" /> è un'istanza di una struttura <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> ed è uguale al valore dell'istanza; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: An Int32 hash code.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash Int32.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is constructed from the values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il codice hash viene costruito dai valori del <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the network interface information that is associated with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni sull'interfaccia di rete associate a una chiamata al metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value, which represents the index of the network interface.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> che rappresenta l'indice dell'interfaccia di rete.

trans-unit.source: You can use this index with <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> to get more information about the relevant interface.
trans-unit.target: Questo indice può essere utilizzato con il metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> per ottenere ulteriori informazioni sull'interfaccia corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> a sinistra dell'operatore di uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> a destra dell'operatore di uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> specificate sono equivalenti.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> e <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: L'operatore verifica sia le <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> per entrambi gli argomenti.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> a sinistra dell'operatore di disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> a destra dell'operatore di disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se due istanze specificate della struttura <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> e <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> sono diversi; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: L'operatore verifica sia le <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> per entrambi gli argomenti.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
